name: Master Down
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the master is down, returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Master Disconnected
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the master is disconnected, returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Master Link Down
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the master link is down, returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Slave Disconnected
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the slave is disconnected, returns `OK` otherwise.
